document.full_text: pakistan declared the killing of osama bin laden a "major setback" to global terrorism, but it will inevitably come under pressure to explain how the al qaeda leader was holed up in a mansion near a military facility.
document.title: heat on pakistan as bin laden killed near capital
lines_and_colors: pakistan declared the killing of osama bin laden a "major setback" to global terrorism, but it will inevitably come under pressure to explain how the al qaeda leader was holed up in a mansion near a military facility.
